inclusion.criterion: The subject has failed conservative treatment and is a candidate for spinal fusion surgery.
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention failure of conservative treatment or candidacy for spinal fusion surgery.

inclusion.criterion: The subject is ≥18 years old and of legal age of consent.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is 45 years old, which meets the age criterion.

inclusion.criterion: The subject is skeletally mature (epiphyses closed).
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided in patient text about skeletal maturity or epiphysis closure.

exclusion.criterion: Subject has systemic infection or infection at the surgical site.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention any infections.

exclusion.criterion: Subject has a medical condition that would interfere with post-operative assessments and care (i.e., metabolic bone disease, neuromuscular disease, autoimmune disease, active malignancy, psychiatric disease, paraplegia, quadriplegia, etc.).
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and chronic pain, but no other conditions mentioned.

exclusion.criterion: Subject is pregnant/breastfeeding at the time of enrollment, or plans to become pregnant during the course of the study.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention pregnancy or breastfeeding.

notes: Unknowns include failure of conservative treatment and candidacy for spinal fusion surgery. Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, but no other exclusion criteria are clearly triggered.
